/* 게시글 목록 조회 */ SELECT T1.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , T1.TITLE AS title , T1.CONTENT AS content , T1.WRITER AS writer , T1.USE_YN AS useYn , T1.REG_DATE AS regDate , T1.MOD_DATE AS modDate FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , USE_YN , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
) T1
/* 게시글 상세 조회 */ SELECT BOARD_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , USE_YN , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
